name: Cycle of Seasons
description:
This is a prototype for a turn-based strategy game where you must try to keep your people from starving. Build houses, plant fields and fight monsters.

Controls: Everything is controllable with the mouse. Click on your farmer or your house to get started. You can also move the camera with the arrow keys. Click on the hourglass in the top-right corner to advance the turn.

Currently, there is no objective for the level. In the mean time, try to keep as large a population alive as possible.

Thanks to:

resi_cat for help making the game

Aleksandr Makarov for the environment art

Kacper Woźniak for the character art

Andre Mari Coppola for additional art

Beast Pixels for additional art

The music is Fire Tree by Axletree
